Body: Description: Christian has signed up to the customer Portal but does not receive the confirmation email allowing him to complete the sign up. He has checked SPAM and nothing appears. Email is : lehr@lehr.at

What We've Learned Updated: Customer is not receiving the confirmation email when trying to access the customer portal.
Checked and the account is activated
Next Steps Updated: Waiting for customer to check if he can access to the portal now, or if he need to reset the password.
Provided a new password. I tested it and worked on my side. Will wait for customer's confirmation
